          <title>
            <string language="hu">Mózes és a Tízparancsolat</string>
            <string language="en">Mose and the Ten Commandments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mose und die 10 Gebote</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mose et les Dix commandements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mose e os dez commandments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mose ed i dieci ordini</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Mose και οι δέκα εντολές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mose y los diez mandamientos</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Mózes és a Tízparancsolat (héber írás)</string>
            <string language="en">Mose and the Ten Commandments (hebrew writing)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Sínai-hegy,  Sínai-félsziget,  Tízparancsolat,  héber írás,  </string>
            <string language="en">Sina Mountain,  Sina Peninsula, Ten Commandments, hebrew writing</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mose und die 10 Gebote (hebräisches Schreiben)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mose et les Dix commandements (écriture 
hébreue)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mose e os dez commandments (escrita hebrew)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mose ed i dieci ordini (scrittura ebraica)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Mose και οι δέκα εντολές (εβραϊκά που γράφουν)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mose y los diez mandamientos (escritura hebrea)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sina Berg, Sina Halbinsel, 10 Gebote, hebräisches 
Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Montagne de Sina, péninsule de Sina, Dix commandements,
écriture hébreue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Montanha de Sina, península de Sina, dez commandments,
escrita hebrew</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Montagna di Sina, penisola di Sina, dieci ordini, 
scrittura ebraica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βουνό Sina, Sina χερσόνησος, δέκα εντολές, εβραϊκό 
γράψιμο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Montaña de Sina, península de Sina, diez 
mandamientos, escritura hebrea</string>
